name: Debris Dodging Star Retry
description: The original game, Debris Dodging Star had two errors. One was being able to move up and down, and the other was sometimes you could not dodge. Fix to moving up and down is the rule: [ vertical player ] -> [   player ]. Fix to the inability to dodge is new objects called e1 - e6, in a legend group called "empty." This "empty" group was then added into the generator rule, to space debris and power-ups out. This doesn't mean DDSD will not come out.
